page.title: 05Sunday family together.
page.content: Sunday is usually the only day in the week that we spend together as my mother normaly works on a saturday. We generally all stay In bed until 10.00 and then get up and have breakfast. My mother prepares dinner and cleans up; Dad sometimes works in the garden or cleans the car. My sister and I normally play in the garden if the weather is fine. After lunch we visit our grandparents at Maes Y Cwmmer which is about seven miles away. After a two hour visit we leave for home. During Sunday evening we watch television and play games. The Kendrick week end is full of activity.
